children.value: is a standard interface for interactions with methods and events described in

. These interactions are generally concerned with the colony network as a whole. This includes operations like getting a count of all colonies on the network, querying for information about a skill, or registering an ENS label for a user.

Get the address of either the active or inactive reputation mining cycle. The active reputation mining cycle is the one currently under consideration by reputation miners. The inactive reputation cycle is the one with the log that is being appended.
A boolean indicating whether to get the active or inactive reputation mining cycle.

The address of the reputation mining cycle.
